title: Swap school logo asset and update branding references

requirements.summary: Add a new square-cropped school emblem logo as a generated static asset.
acceptanceCriteria: A new logo file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/pkm-school-logo-2026.dim_512x512.png.
The logo has a square aspect ratio, is tightly cropped around the circular emblem, and has good contrast/sharpness suitable for UI display.
The logo renders correctly when loaded directly via the browser at /assets/generated/pkm-school-logo-2026.dim_512x512.png (no 404).

file_operations.description: Create the finalized 512x512 PNG logo from IMG_20260208_024007233.jpg and IMG_20260208_024007233-1.jpg: tightly crop around the circular emblem, ensure square aspect ratio, and adjust for sharpness/contrast suitable for UI.

requirements.summary: Update centralized branding to point to the new logo asset and ensure header + home hero render it via BRANDING.logoPath.
acceptanceCriteria: The Header logo (frontend/src/components/Header.tsx) and Home screen hero logo (frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx) both display the updated logo without layout breakage or distortion.
No other parts of the UI reference the old logo path /assets/generated/pkm-school-logo-v2.dim_512x512.png for the school logo.

file_operations.description: Update BRANDING.logoPath to '/assets/generated/pkm-school-logo-2026.dim_512x512.png' so all logo usages switch via the centralized branding constant.
Confirm the sticky header uses BRANDING.logoPath for the logo render and adjust only if needed to avoid distortion (keep square rendering with object-contain).
Confirm the Home screen hero logo uses BRANDING.logoPath and adjust only if needed to avoid layout breakage or distortion (preserve object-contain and existing sizing).
